text: NGO is an abbreviation for non-governmental organization. It also may refer to: * Ngô (吴), a Vietnamese surname equivalent to Chinese name Ng or Wu * Wu (surname), Ngo in Hokkien * Ao (surname), Ngo in Cantonese * .ngo, a file extension for an NG Linker Object (NGML) file * New Gravitational-wave Observatory, a European Space Agency project * Chūbu Centrair International Airport, IATA airport code designation **Nagoya Airfield, its former designation
title: NGO (disambiguation)
